data.title: Honoring Eugene O'Neill (1888–1953): A Centennial Review of Literature
data.meta_description: Honoring Eugene O'Neill (1888–1953): A Centennial Review of Literature - Author: Evelyn S. Meyer
data.text: When Eugene O'Neill died, theatre critic Brooks Atkinson said of him, “A giant writer has dropped off the earth….He shook up the drama as well as audiences and helped to transform the theatre into an art seriously related to life.” (New York Times, 30 December 1953).
